body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park           Learn About the Park       Wupatki is a Treasure As rangers, we might be a little biased, but we think there's something here for everyone. If you're working on a project for school, researching for science, or just indulging your curiosity about culture and nature, this is the place to be.   Photos & Multimedia features images, virtual tours, and short films about people and pueblos. History & Culture tells the stories of people who have lived at or otherwise influenced Wupatki from paleolithic times 10,000 years ago all the way to today. From coyotes and ravens to wildflowers and climate change, the Nature page has information on plants, animals, and the environment. We have useful information for teachers and youth on our Education and Kids pages. Management tells about park administration, statistics, laws, and policies.
